DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the pharmacokinetics, efficacy and safety of T2345 versus an active comparator.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics, Efficacy and Safety Assessment of T2345 Compared With Active Comparator in Newly Diagnosed Patients With Open-angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Untreated bilateral newly diagnosed patients with primary open angle glaucoma Any ocular hypertension other than chronic open angle glaucoma
